languages.text: "Пережить подобное в юности должно быть непросто".
"It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."
languages.original_text: "Пережить подобное в юности должно быть непросто".

traits.locale_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all that at a young age."
"It must have been difficult to go through all that at a young age."
"It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."
"It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

languages.text: «Debió de ser muy duro pasar por todo eso siendo una niña».
languages.original_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

traits.locale_text: «Debió de ser muy duro pasar por todo eso siendo una niña».

languages.text: 「幼い頃に、そのすべてを経験したとは…きっと大変だっただろう」
languages.original_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

traits.locale_text: 「幼い頃に、そのすべてを経験したとは…きっと大変だっただろう」

languages.text: “还是孩子的时候就要经历这一切，这肯定很痛苦吧。”
languages.original_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

traits.locale_text: “还是孩子的时候就要经历这一切，这肯定很痛苦吧。”

languages.text: "Es muss schwierig gewesen sein, das alles als Kind durchzumachen."
languages.original_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

traits.locale_text: "Es muss schwierig gewesen sein, das alles als Kind durchzumachen."

languages.text: « Il n'a pas dû être facile de traverser toutes ces épreuves dès votre plus jeune âge. »
languages.original_text: "It must have been difficult to go through all of that as a child."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'a pas dû être facile de traverser toutes ces épreuves dès votre plus jeune âge. »
